name: Flicker Feathers (dan990878)
description:
An interactive story  based on real people and events. Flicker Feathers was created to keep the story of Greenville, CA in the public's awareness. The town was destroyed by the Dixie Fire on Aug. 4th, 2021. The flicker is an important bird in native Maidu tradition. Their bright orange feathers represent fire, friendship, and hope.

As winter approaches, hundreds of people are still without adequate housing, and many face financial hardship. Please visit https://flickerfeathers.carrd.co/ to learn how you can help Greenville and its residents. Thank you!

This game was made over the course of 36 hours for a hackathon by Danielle Tulchinsky (art and development), Brooke Rahn (story), and Jacqueline Anokyewaa (story). Created with the Bitsy game editor.
